trans-unit.source: Represents a grammar rule.
trans-unit.target: 表示语法规则。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> class to create a new rule at run time or to modify a rule in an existing grammar stream or file at run time.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>类在运行时创建新规则，或在运行时修改的现有语法流或文件中的规则。

trans-unit.source: The words and phrases specified by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objects in grammars defined by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instances limit the spoken input that the recognizer must be able to identify.
trans-unit.target: 单词和短语由指定<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>在语法中所定义的对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>实例限制语音识别器必须能够识别的输入。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object specifies the sequence in which words and phrases must be spoken by ordering the objects that contain them.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象指定在其中的单词和短语必须要朗读通过排序包含它们的对象的序列。

trans-unit.source: Words and phrases within a rule are represented by objects such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> elements.
trans-unit.target: 单词和短语规则中的表示由对象如<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>元素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property to access the collection of child objects that an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object contains.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A>属性来访问的子集合对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象包含。

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> can be specified in a rule reference from a rule in an external grammar by setting its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定是否<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>可以通过将设置指定在从外部语法中的规则的规则引用其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It is not legal to define an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> that is empty or that contains only white space.
trans-unit.target: 它是不合法定义<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>，它是空的或者仅包含空格。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the `rule` element that is defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: 此类表示`rule`World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 中定义的元素[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。

trans-unit.source: For information about the SRGS `rule` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [rule Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da67b4aa-0545-426a-a02f-1417b968021e).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠 SRGS`rule`元素以及它支持通过 System.Speech，有关详细信息请参阅[规则元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da67b4aa-0545-426a-a02f-1417b968021e)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule.
trans-unit.target: 规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> class and specifies the identifier for the rule.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> 类和指定规则的标识符的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.%23ctor%2A> constructor initializes the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.%23ctor%2A>构造函数初始化<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Id%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier must be unique within a given grammar.
trans-unit.target: 标识符必须是在给定的语法中是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.%23ctor%2A> constructor throws a <xref:System.FormatException> in the following circumstances:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.%23ctor%2A>构造函数引发<xref:System.FormatException>出现下列情况：

trans-unit.source: `id` is not a valid XML name, as defined in [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 (Fifth Edition)](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/).
trans-unit.target: `id` 不是有效的 XML 名称中定义[可扩展标记语言 (XML) 1.0 （第 5 版）](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/)。

trans-unit.source: To paraphrase this definition, a valid XML name must begin with a letter, an underscore ('_'), or a colon (':') and can be followed by zero or more NameChar characters (also defined in the XML specification).
trans-unit.target: 来解答问题此定义，有效的 XML 名称必须以字母、 下划线 ('_') 或冒号开头 (:) 后, 跟零个或多个 NameChar 字符 （也在 XML 规范中定义）。

trans-unit.source: `id` is "NULL" or "VOID" or "GARBAGE".
trans-unit.target: `id` 为"NULL"或"VOID"或"垃圾"。

trans-unit.source: `id` contains at least one invalid rule ID character.
trans-unit.target: `id` 包含至少一个无效的规则 ID 字符。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that recognizes the phrase "A nation that has won the World Cup is" followed by the name of a country that has won the World Cup.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建识别短语语法"赢得了世界杯 nation is"跟赢得了世界杯的国家/地区的名称。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object named `winnerRule` and passes in the identifier `WorldCupWinner` as a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象名为`winnerRule`并传递在标识符中`WorldCupWinner`作为<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object consists of an array of new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects containing alternatives to be recognized by the rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>对象包含的数组新<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>包含可选方案可供无法识别的规则的对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 为空。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is not a proper rule identifier.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 不是正确的规则标识符。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule.
trans-unit.target: 规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 一个由 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> 元素组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> class from an array of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> 对象的数组初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.%23ctor%2A> constructor initializes the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.%23ctor%2A>构造函数初始化<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Id%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier must be unique within a given grammar.
trans-unit.target: 标识符必须是在给定的语法中是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.%23ctor%2A> constructor throws a <xref:System.FormatException> in the following circumstances:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.%23ctor%2A>构造函数引发<xref:System.FormatException>出现下列情况：

trans-unit.source: `id` is not a valid XML name, as defined in [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 (Fifth Edition)](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/).
trans-unit.target: `id` 不是有效的 XML 名称中定义[可扩展标记语言 (XML) 1.0 （第 5 版）](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/)。

trans-unit.source: To paraphrase this definition, a valid XML name must begin with a letter, an underscore ('_'), or a colon (':') and can be followed by zero or more NameChar characters (also defined in the XML specification).
trans-unit.target: 来解答问题此定义，有效的 XML 名称必须以字母、 下划线 ('_') 或冒号开头 (:) 后, 跟零个或多个 NameChar 字符 （也在 XML 规范中定义）。

trans-unit.source: `id` is "NULL" or "VOID" or "GARBAGE".
trans-unit.target: `id` 为"NULL"或"VOID"或"垃圾"。

trans-unit.source: `id` contains at least one invalid rule ID character.
trans-unit.target: `id` 包含至少一个无效的规则 ID 字符。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that recognizes the phrase "A nation that has won the World Cup is" followed by the name of a country that has won the World Cup.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建识别短语语法"赢得了世界杯 nation is"跟赢得了世界杯的国家/地区的名称。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a public rule named `WorldCupWinner`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建一个名为的公共规则`WorldCupWinner`。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates two <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objects, `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`, passing in a <xref:System.String> for the rule identifier and an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement> array containing a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例创建两个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象，`ruleEurope`和`ruleSAmerica`，并传入<xref:System.String>规则标识符和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement>数组，包含<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>对象。

trans-unit.source: Subsequently, the example adds rule references to `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica` from the rule `WorldCupWinner`.
trans-unit.target: 随后，该示例将添加到规则引用`ruleEurope`和`ruleSAmerica`从规则`WorldCupWinner`。

trans-unit.source: The created grammar has the following form.
trans-unit.target: 创建的语法具有以下形式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elements" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elements" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 为空。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is not a proper rule identifier.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 不是正确的规则标识符。

trans-unit.source: An object that inherits from <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> and specifies what can be recognized.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> 继承并指定能识别的对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> to an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> 对象添加一个 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" />。

trans-unit.source: Typical additions to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object include <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> objects that specify what speakers can say.
trans-unit.target: 典型添<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象包括<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>指定发言人可以说的对象。

trans-unit.source: A valid rule element must contain at least one piece of recognizable text or one rule reference.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效规则元素必须包含至少一种可识别的文本或一个规则引用。

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[创建语法使用 SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object may also contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> objects that add semantic values and semantic keys to the rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象也可能包含<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>向规则添加语义值和语义的键的对象。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engine will return the semantic information, as well as the recognized phrase, when it recognizes the phrase.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别引擎将返回的语义信息，以及所识别的短语时它可以识别的短语。

trans-unit.source: See [Semantic Interpretation Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e115391-73b3-4666-8fd1-540c529de3b0) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[语义解释标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e115391-73b3-4666-8fd1-540c529de3b0)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that recognizes the phrase "A nation that has won the World Cup is" followed by the name of a country that has won the World Cup.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建识别短语语法"赢得了世界杯 nation is"跟赢得了世界杯的国家/地区的名称。

trans-unit.source: After creating the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object `winnerRule` and giving it the string identifier `WorldCupWinner`, the example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A> method to append the string "A nation that has won the World Cup is" to the rule.
trans-unit.target: 在创建后<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象`winnerRule`并为其提供的字符串标识符`WorldCupWinner`，该示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A>方法以将字符串追加"赢得了世界杯 nation is"规则。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates two additional rules, `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，示例创建两个其他规则，`ruleEurope`和`ruleSAmerica`。

trans-unit.source: Again using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A> method, the example appends an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object to the `WorldCupWinner` rule that contains rule references to `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`.
trans-unit.target: 再次使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A>方法，该示例将追加<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>对象传递给`WorldCupWinner`包含对规则引用的规则`ruleEurope`和`ruleSAmerica`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> 实例中 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of elements in the rule.
trans-unit.target: 规则中元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: The elements in an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object can consist of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> objects.
trans-unit.target: 中的元素<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象可以包含<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifier for the rule.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the rule.
trans-unit.target: 规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for a rule is a string that contains the name of the rule.
trans-unit.target: 规则的标识符是包含规则的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A value used to set <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Id%2A> must adhere to the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 用于设置一个值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Id%2A>必须遵守以下规则：

trans-unit.source: The value must be a valid XML name, as defined in [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 (Fifth Edition)](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/).
trans-unit.target: 值必须是有效的 XML 名称中定义[可扩展标记语言 (XML) 1.0 （第 5 版）](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/)。

trans-unit.source: To paraphrase this definition, a valid XML name must begin with a letter, an underscore ('_'), or a colon (':') and can be followed by zero or more NameChar characters (also defined in the XML specification).
trans-unit.target: 来解答问题此定义，有效的 XML 名称必须以字母、 下划线 ('_') 或冒号开头 (:) 后, 跟零个或多个 NameChar 字符 （也在 XML 规范中定义）。

trans-unit.source: The value can be "NULL" or "VOID" or "GARBAGE".
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为"NULL"或"VOID"或"垃圾"。

trans-unit.source: The value cannot contain any invalid rule ID character.
trans-unit.target: 值不能包含任何无效的规则 ID 字符。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Id" /> to an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Id" /> 设置为无效值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a rule can be activated for recognition and when the rule can be referenced by other rules.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否可以为识别激活一条规则，以及此规则何时可由其他规则引用。

trans-unit.source: A value the sets the scope for the rule.
trans-unit.target: 设置规则范围的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value for scope is `Private`.
trans-unit.target: 作用域的默认值是`Private`。

trans-unit.source: A private rule can only be activated for recognition by a rule reference from the root rule in its containing grammar or from another rule that is referenced from the root rule.
trans-unit.target: 私有规则仅可以识别通过从其包含的语法中的根规则或从根规则引用的另一个规则的规则引用激活。

trans-unit.source: A private rule cannot be referenced by an external grammar, unless the private rule is declared as the root rule of its containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 不能由外部的语法，引用专用的规则，除非私有规则被声明为其包含的语法的根规则。

trans-unit.source: If its scope is set to `Public`, an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object can be activated for recognition by a reference from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> object in the containing grammar or from a rule in an external grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果其作用域设置为`Public`、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象可以通过从引用激活进行识别<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>对象在包含语法或从外部语法中的规则。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that recognizes the phrase "A nation that has won the World Cup is" followed by the name of a country that has won the World Cup.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建识别短语语法"赢得了世界杯 nation is"跟赢得了世界杯的国家/地区的名称。

trans-unit.source: It creates a public rule named `WorldCupWinner` and sets the scope of that rule to Public.
trans-unit.target: 它将创建一个名为的公共规则`WorldCupWinner`，并将该规则的作用域设置为公共。

trans-unit.source: The created grammar has the following form.
trans-unit.target: 创建的语法具有以下形式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。
